channel.title: Need help with my quest tab RSPS ( project insanity..)
channel.description:
i need to add a dialogue for when i click on the quest name, that open a dialogue for the quest.
if anyone can help me i can pay!!!!

item.title: Need help with my quest tab RSPS ( project insanity..)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Help here is free, payment is not needed nor allowed.

You’re going to want to make sure you have some form of debugging, and it will need to be “on”. (Something like System.out.println("Button: "+ actionbuttonid); ) Make sure it’s in ClickingButtons.java, as that’s the class that handles the packet when a button is clicked on the client.

From there, you’re going to want to click the quest of your choice, it will then print the code I talked about above.

Then you want to add your buttons function to the switch block (assuming you already have it)

Here’s your switch block (most of it, should look similar):

switch(actionbuttonid) { case 2656: break; case 34598: //some functions and such break; }
That’s only a rough outline.

You’re going to want to add:

case #:// The number printed from earlier
     //The stuff you want to do here
     break;

Read full topic
